Olaf.name: Olaf
Olaf.title: the Berserker
Olaf.lore: An unstoppable force of destruction, the axe-wielding Olaf wants nothing but to die in glorious combat. Hailing from the brutal Freljordian peninsula of Lokfar, he once received a prophecy foretelling his peaceful passing—a coward's fate, and a great insult among his people. Seeking death, and fueled by rage, he rampaged across the land, slaughtering scores of great warriors and legendary beasts in search of any opponent who could stop him. Now a brutal enforcer for the Winter's Claw, he seeks his end in the great wars to come.
Olaf.blurb: An unstoppable force of destruction, the axe-wielding Olaf wants nothing but to die in glorious combat. Hailing from the brutal Freljordian peninsula of Lokfar, he once received a prophecy foretelling his peaceful passing—a coward's fate, and a great...
allytips: Olaf can combine Berserker Rage, Vicious Strikes, and Ragnarok at low life to become deceptively strong.
The bonus healing granted by Vicious Strikes amplifies your Life Steal from all sources as well as heals from allies.
enemytips: Olaf becomes more dangerous the lower life he is. Save your disables to finish him off.
Preventing Olaf from reaching his axe will minimize the amount of harassment he can cause in the laning phase.
Olaf has reduced defenses from damage during Ragnarok, despite being immune to disables. If you can't escape from Olaf during Ragnarok, try focusing your damage on him with your teammates.

spells.name: Undertow
spells.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Move Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
spells.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe, dealing {{ totaldamage }} physical damage and Slowing by {{ e2 }}% for between {{ e4 }} and {{ e3 }} seconds, based on distance travelled.

If Olaf picks up the axe, this Ability's Cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

spells.name: Vicious Strikes
spells.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
spells.tooltip: For {{ duration }} seconds, Olaf gains <lifeSteal>{{ lifesteal*100 }}% Life Steal</lifeSteal>, <attackSpeed>{{ attackspeed*100 }}% Attack Speed</attackSpeed>, and increases healing received by up to <healing>{{ healingampmax*100 }}% (based on missing Health)</healing>.

spells.name: Reckless Swing
spells.description: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
spells.tooltip:
Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing {{ totaldamage }} true damage. If the enemy dies, the cost is refunded.

Attacks lower the Cooldown of this Ability by 1 second.

spells.name: Ragnarok
spells.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: Olaf gains {{ resists }} Armor and {{ resists }} Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf ends all Immobilizing and Disabling effects on himself and can't be affected by them for the next {{ duration }} seconds. While active, Olaf loses this Ability's Armor and Magic Resist and instead gains {{ ad }} Attack Damage. Olaf also gains {{ haste*100 }}% Move Speed towards enemy champions for {{ hasteduration }} second.

passive.name: Berserker Rage
passive.description: Olaf gains Attack Speed based on his missing Health.
